SELECT A.MERCHANT_ID, A.USER_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, SHORT_NAME, MERCHANT_TYPE, MERCHANT_OWNER, TEL_NUMBER, HEAD_ICON, MAIN_ICON, CANT_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MERCHANT_ADDR, ABILITY, BUSI_DESC, OPEN_HOURS, STATUS, BUSI_TYPE, REG_TIME, LAST_UPDATE, TOTAL_POINT
, C.MERCHANT_ID IS_COLL
FROM T_MERCHANTS A
LEFT JOIN T_USER_MER_COLL C ON C.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND A.MERCHANT_ID = C.MERCHANT_ID
,T_MERCHANT_EXPAND B WHERE A.MERCHANT_ID = #{MERCHANT_ID} AND B.MERCHANT_ID = #{MERCHANT_ID} AND A.MERCHANT_ID = B.MERCHANT_ID

SELECT * FROM T_MERCHANTS WHERE STATUS = '30'
AND MERCHANT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{MERCHANT_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND SHORT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{SHORT_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND MERCHANT_TYPE = #{MERCHANT_TYPE}
AND MERCHANT_ADDR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{MERCHANT_ADDR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND ABILITY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{ABILITY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND BUSI_DESC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{BUSI_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
